diagram:
graph TD
    A[Start Process] --> B[Collect Input Data]
    B --> C{Input Valid?}
    C -->|No| D[Show Error Message]
    D --> B
    C -->|Yes| E[Process Data]
    E --> F{Data Complete?}
    F -->|No| G[Request Missing Info]
    G --> B
    F -->|Yes| H[Save to Database]
    H --> I{Save Successful?}
    I -->|No| J[Handle Database Error]
    I -->|Yes| O[Generate Report]
    O --> P[Send Email Notification]
    P --> Q[Update User Dashboard]
    Q --> R[Log Success Event]
    R --> S[End Successfully]
